name: GEM_ERPEU_PR_Access_Code
title: Identifier Profile for EU AccessCode
description: The AccessCode that is generated by the FdV in order to access the ePrescription in an EU country.

element.short: The AccessCode for redeeming the ePrescription in an EU country.
element.definition: This is the AccessCode that is generated by the FdV in order to access the ePrescription in an EU country. It is handed to the E-Rezept-Fachdienst by the FdV.
element.comment: 6-digit code that is generated by the FdV in order to access the ePrescription in an EU country.

constraint.human: Format of the AccessCode must be a 6-digit code in the Form [a-z, A-Z, 0-9].
